arts.ttl: Howay Harvey: Toon return to winning ways as Howe sinks Mourinho's Benfica
arts.sum: Newcastle United win their second consecutive Champions League game, beating Benfica 3-0 on Tuesday at St James' Park,

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho shows true colours with full-time act after Newcastle thump Benfica
arts.sum: Newcastle defeated Benfica 3-0 in the Champions League thanks to goals from Anthony Gordon and Harvey Barnes as Jose Mourinho made his feelings clear at full-time at St James' Park

arts.ttl: Gordon shines as Newcastle ease past Mourinho's Benfica
arts.sum: Anthony Gordon starred while Harvey Barnes came off the bench to score twice as Newcastle United beat Jose Mourinho's Benfica 3-0 at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho suffers familiar Newcastle fate as warm words come true in Champions League
arts.sum: Newcastle United secured a 3-0 win as Jose Mourinho and Benfica made the trip to St James' Park in the Champions League where goals from Anthony Gordon and Harvey Barnes separated the sides
